content.raw: New repository for new name (vrx) needs to be set up so it's linked to the bitbucket code. Content we want to keep from the old Dockerhub repo should be ported over. Autobuild should be set up to produce images when new releases are published. Since release 1.0 is already published, this will need to be built and pushed manually.
content.html: New repository for new name (vrx) needs to be set up so it's linked to the bitbucket code. Content we want to keep from the old Dockerhub repo should be ported over. Autobuild should be set up to produce images when new releases are published. Since release 1.0 is already published, this will need to be built and pushed manually.
